attributes.action: Make it law that drivers stop and report collisions with cats
attributes.additional_details: We call for the government to change the law.
attributes.background: If a motorist hits a dog it has to be reported. This doesn’t apply to cats, but they are still someone’s pet. Most are microchipped now and the reporting of cats killed after being hit by cars would at least make their owners aware. It should be an offence to simply drive on!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566080
